name: Mystery Behind The Fortress
description:
Background Story

The archaeologist Murphy Jones was searching through his grandfathers old archaeology notes when he discovered references and a map to the possible whereabouts of a mysterious unearthed fortress deep in the wilderness. Following this discovery he rushed to pack up his belongings to begin a journey deep into the wilderness without checking the weather reports.

As he proceeded to walk through a small narrow passage built from old stone that had weakened over the centuries the wind was growing strong from the brewing dry storm. In front of him he could see the stone walls beginning to cave in from the winds, so he hurriedly ran to the open space seen at the end of the passage way as the walls around him collapsed . With one last large leap, he escaped through the end barely surviving.

Looking around from the collapsed passage he can see buildings sitting within the walls of the hills. Now that he is stuck in the ruins of this fortress, he decided to explore the area for clues and facts unearthing the mysteries of the place and other possible ways to escape the area. 

Summary Of The Game

Explore the environment  interacting with furniture and destroy barrels and boxes searching for three gems to unlock the secret room filled with treasure.

Requirements To Play The Game

- HTC Vive Headset

- VR Motion Controllers
